title: DScore - Watch Face for Sports
summary: DScore watch face turns your Android Wear Watch Face into a live scoreboard.
description: Dscore is a sports application that gives you live scores on your watch face, allowing you to follow your favorite games at a glance from your Android Wear device. There are 9 unique watch faces to choose from and we are constantly adding new sports and wearable watch faces. Download and make your watch face a live scoreboard today!FEATURE-	Live Scores-	Useful Vibrations: Period changes, goals-	User Friendly-	Minimal Data transfer-       Multiple Watch FacesSPORTS COVERAGE:★ SOCCER- Euro 2016- Premier League- Ligue 1- Series A- FA Cup- Champions League- Europa League- LA Liga- MLS- Bundesliga- Copa America- Scottish Premiership★ HOCKEY- NHL- Junior Hockey (Upon request)★ BASKET BALL- NBA- WNBA (Upon request)- NCAAB★ FOOT BALL- NFL- NCAAF★ TENNIS (Upon request)- AEGON Championships- AEGON Classic Birmingham- Gerry Weber Open- Mallorca Open- and more...★ CRICKET (Upon request)★ ESPORT (Upon request)- League Of Legends- Data 2- CS:GO- Heroes Of The Storm- Street Fighter V★ Rugby (Upon request)★ Formula 1 (Upon request)*** PLEASE EMAIL DSCORE@THEXABYTE.COM IF YOU WANT TO REQUEST MORE SPORTS ***
descriptionHTML:
Dscore is a sports application that gives you live scores on your watch face, allowing you to follow your favorite games at a glance from your Android Wear device. There are 9 unique watch faces to choose from and we are constantly adding new sports and wearable watch faces. Download and make your watch face a live scoreboard today!

FEATURE
- Live Scores
- Useful Vibrations: Period changes, goals
- User Friendly
- Minimal Data transfer
- Multiple Watch Faces

SPORTS COVERAGE:

★ SOCCER
- Euro 2016
- Premier League
- Ligue 1
- Series A
- FA Cup
- Champions League
- Europa League
- LA Liga
- MLS
- Bundesliga
- Copa America
- Scottish Premiership

★ HOCKEY
- NHL
- Junior Hockey (Upon request)

★ BASKET BALL
- NBA
- WNBA (Upon request)
- NCAAB

★ FOOT BALL
- NFL
- NCAAF

★ TENNIS (Upon request)
- AEGON Championships
- AEGON Classic Birmingham
- Gerry Weber Open
- Mallorca Open
- and more...

★ CRICKET (Upon request)

★ ESPORT (Upon request)
- League Of Legends
- Data 2
- CS:GO
- Heroes Of The Storm
- Street Fighter V

★ Rugby (Upon request)

★ Formula 1 (Upon request)

*** PLEASE EMAIL DSCORE@THEXABYTE.COM IF YOU WANT TO REQUEST MORE SPORTS ***
comments: It would be great if it stayed connected. Maybe it's just not compatible with Android N 7.1 yet? If it did ever work for me, I would like to see user customizable faces. Colors, hands, etc.
Terrible app. Free version is glitchy. The watch face is of poor quality. If you want me to buy it make your 10 day trial worth it. No where near worth it.
Terrible app. Very glitch and doesn't even have MLB.
Paid for the app and NCAAB is empty in March? No scores?
I love this app The watchface are beautiful (love the dwsign) and i can follow all my sport league.
Awesome Works perfectly and the dev team is great in getting back to you. Thank you and great job.
